business.name: Sweet Rise Bakery
business.tagline: Handcrafted Baked Goods, Made Fresh Daily

hero.headline: Handcrafted Baked Goods, Made Fresh Daily
hero.subheadline: Artisan breads, flaky pastries, and custom cakes baked with love in Portland since 2019.

items.title: Fresh Daily
items.description: Everything baked fresh each morning starting at 4am

items.title: Quality Ingredients
items.description: Organic flour, local eggs, real butter - always

items.title: Made with Love
items.description: Small batch, handcrafted with traditional techniques

items.title: Eco-Friendly
items.description: Sustainable packaging and local sourcing

items.name: Almond Croissant

sections.title: Custom Cakes & Catering
sections.description: From birthday cakes to wedding masterpieces, we create custom cakes for every occasion. Contact us to discuss your vision.

items.name: Emily R.
items.text: The croissants are better than what I had in Paris. I'm not exaggerating!

items.name: Marcus T.
items.text: Their sourdough is the best in Portland. We go through a loaf every two days.

items.name: Jennifer S.
items.text: They made our wedding cake and it was stunning AND delicious. Can't recommend enough!

sections.title: The Sweet Rise Story
sections.content: Sweet Rise began in 2019 when baker Sarah Mitchell decided to turn her passion into her profession. After years of perfecting recipes and training in France, she opened our Alberta Street location. Today, we're proud to be Portland's neighborhood bakery.

team.name: Sarah Mitchell
team.bio: Trained in Paris, obsessed with perfect croissants
